member.name: M:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Commands.Command.ExecuteAsync(System.String,Mirai.Net.Data.Messages.Receivers.GroupMessageReceiver)
member.summary: Execute the command.
member.returns: Returns a task instance that returns a value indicating whether the operation executed successfully.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Commands.Command.ExecuteCoreAsync(System.String,Mirai.Net.Data.Messages.Receivers.GroupMessageReceiver)
member.summary: The internal method to handle with arguments , using to send messages.
member.param:
The arguments that is passed from QQ client. This argument will be pre-handled by the core method . The target value of this argument will be different with different settings of property , if the property is:
The argument will be strictly equal to command name .
The message received from QQ client will start with the command name .
For example, if the command name is a, the message can be "!a arg1 arg2 arg3". Then the core method will cut the command name, keeping arguments arg1, arg2 and arg3 in the target arguments, passing into like "arg1 arg2 arg3", then you can use method to get all values like:
var arguments = args.Split(' ');
Other kinds of values are not supported.

The group message receiver instance. This instance can send message to the target user (i.e. mention somebody @sb), or just send a normal message to the target QQ group without mentioning anybody. You can send message using extension method :
await e.SendMessageAsync(targetMessage);

returns.para: The task of the execution, and with the return value of type.

Naked Subset

member.name: T:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Patterns
member.summary: Extracts a type that stores regular expression patterns.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Patterns.BilibiliPattern
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
1st capture group.
Match with 2 alternative expressions, atomically.
Match a sequence of expressions.
2nd capture group.
Match the string "".
Match the same text as matched by the 2nd capture group.
Match a sequence of expressions.
Match a character in the set [Bb].
Match with 2 alternative expressions, atomically.
Match a sequence of expressions.
Match a whitespace character atomically at most 3 times.
Match ''.
Match a sequence of expressions.
Match 'i'.
3rd capture group.
Match the string "li".
Match the string "bi".
Match the same text as matched by the 3rd capture group.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Patterns.ColorIdPattern
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
Match '#'.
1st capture group.
Match with 2 alternative expressions, atomically.
Match a character in the set [1-9].
Match a sequence of expressions.
Match '1'.
Match a character in the set [0-5].

member.name: M:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Patterns.ColorHexValuePattern
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
Match '#'.
Match a character in the set [A-Fa-f\d] exactly 6 times.
Optional (greedy).
1st capture group.
Match a character in the set [A-Fa-f\d] exactly 2 times.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Patterns.ChineseHouseIndexPattern
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
Match a character in the set [\u5217\u5BAB\u884C].
Match a whitespace character atomically any number of times.
Match a character in the set [1-9].

member.name: M:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Patterns.SimpleTimeSpanPattern
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
Optional (greedy).
"h" capture group.
1st capture group.
Match with 3 alternative expressions.
Match a Unicode digit.
Match a sequence of expressions.
Match a character in the set [01].
Match a Unicode digit.
Match a sequence of expressions.
Match '2'.
Match a character in the set [0-3].
Match a character in the set [Hh].
Optional (greedy).
"m" capture group.
2nd capture group.
Match with 2 alternative expressions.
Match a Unicode digit.
Match a sequence of expressions.
Match a character in the set [1-5].
Match a Unicode digit.
Match a character in the set [Mm].
Optional (greedy).
"s" capture group.
3rd capture group.
Match with 2 alternative expressions.
Match a Unicode digit.
Match a sequence of expressions.
Match a character in the set [1-5].
Match a Unicode digit.
Match a character in the set [Ss].

member.name: T:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Scoring.Scorer
member.summary: Represents a type that handles and creates the data that are used for grading and scoring.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Scoring.Scorer.GetGrade(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the grade via the specified score value.
member.returns: The grade.
member.exception: Throws when the grade value is too large.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Scoring.Scorer.GetWeekendFactor
member.summary: Gets the factor that describes whether today is weekend.
member.returns: The factor value. If today is weekend, 2; otherwise 1.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Scoring.Scorer.GenerateValueEarned(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a value that describes the experience point that the current user can be earned.
member.param: The number of continuous days that the user has already been checking-in.
member.returns: The value.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Scoring.Scorer.GenerateOriginalValueEarned(Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Scoring.Distribution)
member.summary: Generates a value that describes the experience point that the current user can be earned.
member.returns: The value.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Scoring.Scorer.GetScoreEarnedInEachGaming(Sudoku.Runtime.AnalysisServices.DifficultyLevel)
member.summary: Gets the experience point that can be earned by a player in a single gaming.
member.param: The difficulty level of the puzzle.
member.returns: The experience point.
member.exception: Throws when the specified difficulty level or target cells count is not supported.
Throws when the specified difficulty level is invalid.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Scoring.Scorer.GetDeduct(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get deduct via the specified times per gaming.
member.param: The times the user has answered with wrong result.
member.returns: The deduct.
member.exception: Throws when the argument is below 0.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Platforms.QQ.Scoring.Scorer.GetEarnedScoringDisplayingString(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get display string for scores.
member.param: The base score value to be displayed.
member.returns: The score to be displayed.

summary.para: Provides with the type that contains a module initializer method, called automatically by the CLR (Common Language Runtime) to initialize some values.

para.i: The type is called by the compiler and the CLR (Common Language Runtime), which means you cannot use any members in this type manually.

target.name: method
target.summary: Called by the runtime automatically while booting on this solution to initialize the values, data members or any other things that can or should be initialized here.
target.remarks: The concept module is different with assembly. The solution can contain multiple assemblies, while each assembly can contain multiple modules. However, due to the design of Visual Studio project file system, each assembly will only contain one module by default.
